DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare cortical cancellous freeze-dried bone allograft ( FDBA ) material preservation alveolar bone follow extraction non-molar teeth . The primary objective histologically evaluate compare heal extraction socket non-molar teeth graft cortical FDBA versus cancellous FDBA ridge preservation .
DOC.brief_title: Ridge Preservation After Tooth Extraction Using Cortical Versus Cancellous Freeze Dried Bone Allograft
DOC.criteria: single root tooth require extraction future dental implant placement smoke > 10 cigarette per day poorly control diabetes
